body.name: Evenflo Shyft DualRide Infant Car Seat and Stroller Combo with Carryall Storage (Boone Gray)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 1 min
features: TRANSITION FROM INFANT CAR SEAT TO STROLLER IN ONE STEP: Moves little one from backseat to street in a heartbeat — this single piece of baby gear transforms from infant car seat to stroller and back again with ease; leave wheels in base for a lighter infant carrier
MAKE IT BABY’S FIRST CAR SEAT: Accommodates infants as small as 3 lb and up to 35 lb, who measure from 15.7 in. to 32 in.
FEEL CONFIDENT ABOUT SAFETY: Features an anti-rebound base that helps absorb and dissipate crash forces for added stability and peace of mind
INSTALL WITH EASE: LockStrong Installation and Quick Connectors offer solid, secure installation in no time

CONNECT TO YOUR CHILD: Integrated SensorSafe technology alerts you in real-time to 4 potentially unsafe conditions from your child’s car seat via Bluetooth, including unexpected chest clip unbuckling, unsafe temperature in the car, child unattended in the car, and child seated too long

LOVE THE EXTRAS!: Comes with a removable carryall storage bag to pack whatever your little beansprout needs for the day, wheels that nest securely in removable, washable wheel wells in base to keep dirt off your backseat, and a removable cup holder for you!
body.description: Shyft into life with a newborn! The Evenflo® Shyft™ DualRide™ with Carryall Storage Infant Car Seat and Stroller Combo is a single piece of baby gear that Shyfts from infant car seat to stroller in one step, streamlining life on the go. Moving from car to sidewalk? Simply lift the carrier off the base, release the wheels and you’re rolling in no time. From backseat to street in a heartbeat! Maneuvering stairs? Retract the wheels, carry up/down steps, pop the wheels back down and stroll on. No struggling with multiple pieces of gear. No disturbing your little one. This car seat stroller combo makes every trip easier. While researching the best car seats for your little one, consider this: DualRide’s anti-rebound base absorbs and dissipates crash forces to provide additional stability and give you peace of mind, so you can make the Shyft with confidence. Designed for infants as small as 3 lb and up to 35 lb, who measure from 15.7 in. to 32 in., this infant car seat and stroller in one comes with a no-rethread harness that adjusts to 8 positions to grow with your child. Thoughtful design places the infant carrier on the stroller higher, so your baby’s sweet face is always near. You’re looking for a safe infant car seat — and the smart car seat is a connected car seat. With SensorSafe™ to connect you to your little one from the backseat, the DualRide is the savvy choice when it comes to child car seat safety. In car seat mode, DualRide’s integrated SensorSafe technology alerts you in real-time to 4 potentially unsafe conditions from your child’s car seat via Bluetooth: unexpected chest clip unbuckling, temperature too hot or too cold in the car, child unattended in the car, and child seated too long. LockStrong™Installation and Quick Connectors provide solid, secure installation in no time. This stroller car seat combo provides a full-coverage canopy to block rain and snow, with UPF 50+ to protect your baby against the sun. With the DualRide stroller and car seat combo, the extras aren’t extra! A removable carryall storage bag and removable parent cupholder are included. Another plus: Wheels nest securely in the base wheel wells in your vehicle, so you can take just the carrier into your home without tracking in dirt. To finish it off, DualRide’s sophisticated silhouette, washable padding and well-considered touches ensure you’ll make the Shyft to new parenthood in style. Shyft into action, effortlessly!At Evenflo, we go above and beyond government standards to create car seats that are safe. The Evenflo Shyft DualRide meets or exceeds all applicable federal safety standards. It is structural integrity tested at energy levels approximately 2x the federal crash test standard, and it is side-impact tested, rollover tested and temperature tested.If you need help installing your car seat, our ParentLink® customer service experts offer help online in real time. Get live video support with a certified car seat safety technician to assist with proper vehicle installation, so you can drive with confidence. It's been 100 years and Evenflo continues to push the boundaries in baby and children’s gear design and innovation. We meet the needs of new generations of parents by focusing on what they really care about: leading-edge safety, smart design and technology, and convenient features that help them enjoy the journey of parenthood.

productInformation.name: Material Composition
productInformation.value: ‎Polypropylene, Steel, Aluminum, Eps Foam, Nylon, Polyoxymethylene, Polyester, Polyester Fill, Polyurethane Foam

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great safety features
reviews.reviewText: We bought this to use for a trip we were going on and hoped it would fit down the aisle of an airplane. We were pleasantly surprised that it fit perfectly. Granted not a lot of wiggle room, but it fit so we could get down the aisle then break it down to put into a seat. The chest clip is bluetooth connected for a safety feature that will be really good since we live in where temperatures get really hot. It offers a warning if the cars temperature is too high, also alerts if the child is left in the car or buckled too long. Another nice feature is the front wheels can be removed and placed at the bottom of the seat if you aren't using the base piece in your vehicle, making it easier to install. Overall, I would recommend this seat. It is a little on the heavier side due to having the stroller part and car seat in one unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in every way
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this carseat stroller combo. I love how easy it is in and out of the van , can also be carried as just the carseat with no wheels (major weight difference) the premie inserts were perfect my baby wasnt premie just tiny so the extra fluff for her is great. The extension handle is perfect height for the stroller mode. It glides nice and smooth. The extra safety cautions they take on the straps is very comforting. I couldnt be more happy with a carseat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Rolls Royce of Strollers
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this stroller. We’ve been using it for two months now. It is super lightweight and easy to use (once you learn it). Convenient and quick to go from take out of car seat to stroller/stroller to car seat to base. Super easy to adjust straps to fit baby as needed. 10/10, definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Car seat works great
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because I like the idea of not having to lug a stroller around. Due to the issue I don’t have a lot of trunk space. The only downside to this is it’s heavy which makes sense due to it being a stroller car seat combined I don’t recommend it for single moms only cause of how heavy it is but all and all it’s a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doona competitor built to overcome main complaints about Doona
reviews.reviewText: We were going to get a Doona but decided to get the Shyft Dualride when it went on sale. Overall, we are very happy and it functions as well as expected. Once you get the hang of it, it collapses and unfolds pretty easily and is an easy latch in the car seat base. The handle for stroller mode is higher than the Doona so you don't look like an 8 year old awkwardly pushing your doll stroller that you got as a 4 year old. In addition, the wheels can come off so if you are in a situation where you just want the car seat you have that option. For example, at the supermarket you can remove the wheels and put car seat in shopping cart as opposed to doing the awkward one handed push pulls with the car seat and shopping cart like is done with Doona. An annoyance with this is you can only detach the wheels when they're latched to the base so if you're not by your car, you are stuck with the wheels. Also, the hood of the Dual Shyft is big enough to protect the baby from the sun, as opposed to Doona which comes up short. It comes with a detachable stroller bag and cup holder which are useful, but because you can't collapse the stroller with the bag and the cup holder gets in the way in car seat mode, you have to consciously keep track of them and attach them for every use. While my baby was not small, this can hold smaller babies comfortably, unlike the Doona which may not fit early or small babies well. It does feel a little shaky when in stroller mode and would be nice if it was a little more sturdy. Also, while it comes with a base, as of yet Evenflo does not sell separate bases for the Dual Shyft if you want for another car.Major complaint isn't for the car seat itself but the general Evenflo sensor they install to tell you if the kid is in the car. My first time using it, I dropped my baby and wife off at doctor's office before I went to park and my phone wouldn't stop telling me loudly that my kids was left in the car (to be clear, I was in the car not the kid). I ended up having to uninstall the sensor app on my phone to stop it from warning me of this inaginary issue. While in theory I'm supportive of a warning system to save babies, if it's disfunctional then it's worse than nothing and I hope Evenflo fixes it. As an aside, if you're an Orthodox Jew who keeps Shabbos this can be an issue if you use it as your regular stroller due to a light that flashes when you buckle it. A workaround is to not take out the plastic tab when you first use it and the whole sensor won't work. As the systems is terrible anyway, this is not much of a loss and I just recommend very strongly to not be an idiot by leaving your baby in the car alone under any circumstances.Overall, I like the car seat and considering I got it at a cheaper price point than the Doona it was definitely a no brainer. Huge fan of the higher stroller handle and detchable wheels as its easier to use and more flexible than the Doona

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it! You won’t regret it!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been a Doona user for the past 3/4 years, but when I saw this one I said I needed to give it a try. I don’t regret switching ever! This is by far better than a Doona. The sturdiness, the features, the comfort, the style, colors, etc! It’s just worth the buy.
